property.name: description
property.value: Free space on drive containing Namenode's Name Directory. If multiple Name Directories, smallest free space shown

property.name: description
property.value: Percentage of space used on drive contain the Namenode's Name Directory. If multiple Name Directories, largest percentage shown

property.name: description
property.value: The base port of the default file system. SilverFabric will increment at runtime to avoid conflicts.

property.name: description
property.value: The base port where the dfs namenode web ui will listen on.. SilverFabric will increment at runtime to avoid conflicts.

property.name: description
property.value: The base port the namenode JMX server. SilverFabric will increment at runtime to avoid conflicts.

property.name: description
property.value: Comma separated list of Directories for storing copies of Namenode metadata

property.name: description
property.value: Path of the file used to tell the namenode which datanodes should be excluded

property.name: description
property.value: Selected Policy for RackAwareness. Suppported Policies are 'DEFAULT', 'CONFIG_FILE' and 'ENV_VARIABLE'.

property.name: description
property.value: Defines a default Rack value to be used with the DEFAULT Rackawareness Policy

property.name: description
property.value: Defines the environment variable from the slave node to be used to define the rack value

property.name: description
property.value: Defines the environment variable from the slave node to be used to define the rack value
